page.title: 20Last thoughts on the village
page.content: It is becoming more difficult to be able to live in a rural area as remote as this one of Bwlchysarnau. There are problems of declining services, the increasing cost of petrol as a car is essential and the distances involved to the various amenities that are taken for granted by many people in this day and age e.g. sports centres, cinemas, theatres and supermarkets. Farmers are also having problems with the declining value of land and increases in the price of feedstuffs etc. Nevertheless I for one wouldn't live anywhere else. The benefits of a slower way of life can't be counted in financial terms. Text by Krysia Bass
